void adfVolumeInfoWin (HWND hWnd, struct Volume *vol)
 Windows version of adfVolumeInfo().

Detailed Description

Windows version of adfVolumeInfo().

An ADFLib function for Windows which displays a dialogue box containing details about the current disk file. Converted from adfVolumeInfo(), part of ADFLib by Laurent Clevy.

Gary Harris 30/8/00

Function Documentation

void adfVolumeInfoWin (  HWND    hWnd,
struct Volume *    vol
) 
 

Windows version of adfVolumeInfo().

Parameters:
hWnd  - a handle to the parent window.
vol  - the volume in question.
Returns:
Void.
Receives a handle to the window on which to display the dialogue and a pointer to an ADFLib Volume structure. Displays a Windows dialogue containing the disk file data.
